title: PowerPoint & 45 min video created from mp3 audio file.
snippet:
We have have a 45 minute audio track, and we need to have a PowerPoint created and then animated (simply) to be in sync with the Audio.

You will have to create slides based on the audio, and extract important words and phrases to go on the slides.

We can provide the transcript of the audio file.

Slides could be exported as images and then synced with the audio track using Camtasia / Adobe Premiere or similar software.

If you choose not to use powerpoint, and create all the graphics in the video editing tool, that is also fine. 

The final video will be used as a webinar, so has to look like it was a presentation.  This means that we don't need fancy animation or effects.

You will need to have a good eye for marketing, and of course speak great English. 

If you apply for this job, please

1) Make sure you have samples of your work on your profile or ensure you includes links to your work

2) Mention the word "SILDI" in your cover letter, so I know you have read this post. 

3) Be available to speak on skype.

This project is good to go.. and we look forward to hearing from you.
